reviews.review: Awesome game.

Jeu vraiment énorme, la direction artistique est superbe. Une histoire vraiment travaillée ! Pour réellement exploiter les différents mécanismes de gameplay, à commencer directement en difficile voir en mode 1999, qui n'a rien d'insurmontable.

This game beats the first Bioshock in my humble opinion. There where I would get bored of a third playthrough in the original Bioshock, this one doesn't get boring. The atmosphere of this one is EPIC. It's way better than the first one. 

The gameplay is also more exciting. In Bioshock 1 you would feel rather lonely, now you have a companion, which takes away that loneliness but also brings it back during the story. 

The story is the best I've seen so far - nearly all games are repeating the same story with better graphics and different gameplay but this story and the thought behind it and how it all makes sense in the end - the more you know about the discussed subjects, the more you are amazed by the complexity of the story. 

Definitely but this game. The DLC are worth it too.
Genial, historia tremenda, zonas de batalla que impresionan; increible.
Epic

Awesome game, awesome story, awesome feeling while playing it! 
By far one of my favorite game series! A pity that Bioshock is going to an end.
Some shit went down in my brain while playing this game.
Amaze! Very game! Best game 2013!

10/10 would bang again

Gran bel gioco a parere mio uno cei migliori sparatutto.
Ci ritroveremo nuovamente nei panni di Brooker Dewitt che ha un debitocon delle persone poco raccomandabili, e per sdebitarsi deve andare a columbia (una città fluttuante e dove è ambientatato il gioco) e prendere una ragazzina di nome: Elisabett. 
Per quanto riguarda la grafica è ottima con colori molto accesi.
Ma anche le armi sono molte e ottime come: i fulicili, la pistola, e dei poteri che non vi spolero e tante altre cose.
Un consiglio per quelli che non hanno un pc gaming e hanno 4GB di ram, prendetelo comunque, perchè non c'è nessun tipo di lag, lo so perchè io non ho un pc gaming è ho 4GB di RAM.
Best Story ever, absolutely mind-blowing
mind fuck of a story...
Juegazo en todos los estilos , una historia que si tratas de asimilar el final te estalla el cerebro 10/10
10 Elizabeths / 10
Best purchase ever.

très bon jeu 
really good game
So good. gameplay is fun ect but the genious is in the setting and story. unexpetedly brilliant.

When first finishing the story it left me in awe, but still not quite sure wtf happened. it compelled me to do research and find out the full story, it was so worth the time. To accompany its amazing story it has fantastic gameplay with only minor annoyances.  Throughout my play through a ran into only 2 graphical issues, that were resolved when I restarted. This is a 10/10 game and definitely my game of 2013.

Bioshock Infinite is a magnificent game with awesome graphical styling. It features a 10 - 15 hours singleplayer and no multiplayer. The singleplayer story is very intriguing and leave a lot of room for speculation. The gameplay is pretty good. The player can kill enemies with fire arms or magic, usually the most effective way is to use a combination of both. It does feel a little old school but it is enjoyable. It runs very well on high graphical setting on a AMD FX-6300 + Radeon HD7870 Ghz edition PC.

An absolute must-play. Infinite is the most action packed game in the trilogy and has one of the most clever endings of any game. Make sure to play the original Bioshock before playing through the Burial at Sea Episodes because it makes it so much more enjoyable connecting the dots between the worlds of Columbia and Rapture (there is a brief clip that summarizes the original Bioshock at the beginning of Episode 2, but Bioshock is completely worth a playthrough on its own). This game serves as the perfect ending to one of the most incredible series ever.

(no spoilers) Biggest mindfuck game I've ever played. I was thuroughly confused throut the entire game as to where I was and If was reall or not, or if it even mattered what I did there. The ending was one of the dumbest endings I've ever seen, yet at the same time it was amazing. It's like the game was midfucking you the entire time and it finally finished and the sperm of knowledge "came" into your mind. Bottom line. Play once and done. I won't play it through twice.

Гениальная игра! Потрясающее сочетание социальной сатиры (как мне показалось) и увлекательного геймплея. Особенно доставили дополнительные эпизоды. После прохождения и просмотра концовки второго эпизода возникло дикое желание перепройти первую часть биошока. Спасибо вам разработчики за такое прекрасное путешествие! =)

Ambitious, gorgeous, and filled with detail. It was a blast exploring the city of Columbia. Better than Bioshock 1? For me, nope, but it's still a damn good game. Combat doesn't feel as frantic or involved as the previous game, though they did manage to get rid of that hacking minigame (love-hate relationship with that thing xD). Elizabeth and her AI is brilliant, though. She never got in my way, always passed me the right things at the right time during firefights, and it's interesting to see her develop as a character. The story's not too bad, either, though there's a direction that it takes that I felt backed it up against a corner. All in all, it's a great game with a setting that sucks you in and keeps you playing till the end.
Extremely engaging and fun. Brilliant story, ambience, and gameplay. 10/10 would recommend.

Well you know, it's uh
well
It's not Gone Home, at least. I'd say like.. six..? Six out of ten? Yeah?

Somewhere in the combat mechanics, the developers took a wrong turn and butchered the original Bioshock mechanics. Maybe it was the 2 weapon limit, maybe not. The world doesn't seem all the interesting, sure it's a floating city, but hell it might as well just be a normal city. The original Bioshock at least had an atmosphere which really sucked me in, all this game does is suck. I already know the story and know what happens, so the gameplay isn't really enticing enough for me to want to play it throughout. 

I think this is my most thought out review to date.

6/10

re:BURIAL AT SEA EP3 - A fitting conclusion to the Bioshock series... which is good given that Irrational Games is no more and I shudder to think what another studio would've done. And oh yeah, the game itself ain't that bad either but lets be honest folks, it's the story that's the real star here. Well worth the price of the season pass, even though I didn't play the Clouds Combat DLC.

one of the best point and click adventures ever.
its also a great spam "f" simulator.

Excelente, la historia es realmente impresionante, me gustó mucho. La jugabilidad es buena, me costó agarrarle la mano a los controles, tuve q reorganizarlos un poco. Pero te engancha hasta el final. Recomendable!!!

Tauchet ein in die Unterwasserstadt Rapture!.. Ach,was rede ich denn da?! Ich meinte:"Tauchet ein,in die verrückte,skurille Welt über den Wolken,Columbia!Bringt ihnen das Mädchen,um eure Schulden zu tilgen!" Bioshock Infinite von 2k Games ist der erfolgreiche Nachfolger der Bioshock-Reihe.Die Hauptmission: Ein Mädchen namens Elizabeth finden.Doch das ist gar nicht so einfach wie es sich anhört!Denn es gibt einige Leute,die euch daran hindern wollen!Und diese müsst ihr natürlich in gewohnter Shooter-Manier aus dem Weg räumen.Dazu kommt das ihr verschiedene Fähigkeiten erlernt,die euch die Arbeit erleichtern.


Zur Story: Es geht um BookerDeWitt,einen Privatdetektiv,der sich Schulden durch Spielsucht eingehandelt hat.Eines Tages bekommt er die Nachricht,das er seine Schuld tilgen kann wenn er ihnen ein Mädchen (Elizabeth) bringt. Auf dem Weg zu ihr erlebt er actionreiche Kämpfe und erlangt verschiedene Fähigkeiten. (Insgesamt 8 Stück.) Mit ihr erfährt er dann die "ganze" Geschichte ihres Lebens.Es gibt einige Wendungen,die unerwartete Geheimnisse über Elizabeth's Familie preisgeben.


Grafik: 9/10
PRO:
+Gute Animationen der Spielfiguren
+Detaillierte Texturen
+Gute Effekte
+wirkt lebendig
+coole "Cartoon"-Grafik


CONTRA:
-Nicht atemberaubend
-Zurzeit gibt es bessere Engines auf dem Markt


Sound: 10/10
PRO:
+Keine verwaschene Sounds
+Waffen klingen "echt"
+Ein echter Ohrenschmaus


Spiel:9/10
PRO:
+Interessante Story und Wendungen
+Gut umgesetzt
+Gute Grafik
+Guter Sound
+Nette Waffen
+Coole Fähigkeiten


CONTRA:
-Gegner-KI ist teils sehr schlecht..


Charaktere:10/10
+BookerDeWitt hat lustige Sprüche auf Lager.
+Elizabeth hilft einem in gefählichen Situation mit verschiedenen Gütern (Gesundheits-Kits,Munition.etc) und gibt hilfreiche Tipps. Sie kann Risse öffnen und somit dem Spieler helfen. (Waffen-Automaten,Medi-Kits,Waffen.etc)
Gegner:10/10
+Es gibt viele verschiedene Gegner,die auch eine gewisse Taktik erfordern. (Handymans,Patriots etc.)


Steuerung:10/10
+Die Steuerung ist auf inviduelle Weise an jeden Spiel-stil anpassbar.


RUNDUM: EIn klasse Spiel,gute Grafik,guter Sound,gute Story und wie oben schon genannt ich kann es NUR WEITEREMPFEHLEN!

P.S.:ICH <3 ES und kann es fast jedem Fan der Bioshock-Reihe empfehlen! Warum nur fast? Weil dieses Bioshock total anders ist als Teil 1 & 2.

this is one of the reasons that the gaming industry is broken this is a great game with one the greatest story and characters i have ever played but the people who don't know what a real game is (this) decide to buy the newest call of duty or battlefield which is just a graphical improvment so prove to be a real gamer and buy this!!!!

Самое главное в этой игре - сюжет  . Проходил  BioShock Infinite я  четыре раза . Один на самом хардкоре . Оценил я сюжет после первого прохождения . Столько было эмоций... Ещё атомосфера в этой игре добавляет большой скачёк вверх к оценкам . Весь этот прекрасный мир, милая спутница , безумный народ . Такое ощущение , что ты попал в красивый , сказочный мир , где царит спокойствие . Тут непонятно откуда взялся "Лживый пастырь" , который крадёт дочь великого "Пророка" . Весь мир сразу же превращается в хаос и войну . Эти события превращаются в великолепную атмосферу . 
Итог : 
Сюжет : 10/10
Атмосфера : 10/10
Геймплей : 8/10
Графика : 9/10 
Общая оценка : 9,25/10
shit

«А что если однажды ты поймёшь, что тебе не нравится твой выбор?» 

-Букер, ты боишься Бога? 
-Нет, но тебя - боюсь. 
Именно с этих слов начинается, поистине потрясающие приключение. Главный герой плывет на лодке к старому маяку, который как ему сказали, поможет попасть в летающий город Колумбия. Где он должен найти девушку по имени Элизабет и доставить её в Нью-Йорк. «Приведи девчонку и мы в расчёте», вот его миссия. Казалось бы, классическая история. "Принцесса в замке и рыцарь в сияющих доспехах". Но все не так просто, как может показаться на первый взгляд.

+Плюсы: потрясающий сюжет, разнообразный геймплей, интересный мир, незабываемая атмосфера, очаровательные персонажи, ну и прекрасная графика.

-Минусы: не совсем удобная система сохранений, игра рано или поздно, подойдёт к концу.

Также при покупке двух сюжетных дополнений которые начинаются подобно основной игре, надо просто  на просто найти пропавшую девочку но все оказывается не так просто как казалось.
Вы получаете объяснение хоть не большей части но покрайней мере части вопросов вознихших при прохожденни  BioShock 1.
Таких как: Как Атлас узнал о тебе? Зачем он прикаждом поручении говорил фразу "Будь так любезен" ? Как Восторг пришел в упадок? Как Большие папочки могли так сильно привязыватся к Маленьким сестричкам? И Т.Д.
«Ценность представляют Дети, а не их детство» 
Итог:
Геймплей: 9
Сюжет: 10
Графика: 9
Звук и музыка: 9
Управление: 9
ОЦЕНКА: 9.8\10

Throat-constrictingly intense combat to make you feel robust and savvy, art direction and atmosphere to overwhelm and astound you, a licensed soundtrack to die (a million million times) for, a cartoony doe-eyed sidekick throwing a tantrum for a million gamers' waifu status, and spectacle of a very high magnitude all do a wonderful job of making sure you never think hard enough to notice the story doesn't [i]actually[/i] make a great deal of sense. An excellent game and worthy experience, but a greater, craftily clever ode to and excuse for Ken Levine's rusty toolkit.

I'll say, the game lived up to my expectations exactly. I'll say this now, I am a story player, I will play games for fun and interesting gameplay and I love puzzles, but the best way to get me to play a game is to get me to play till the story makes me want to finish it, even if it's just to see how the terrible story ends. 

Bioshock has always been a fairly fun, interesting and story filled series. Sadly, I have to say, I did not enjoy Infinite as much as I should have, for mildly the same reason that I hated World War Z. It's not the same style or story, it's just named the same. The gameplay is fast paced and fairly well done, the characters and story are nice, if a bit too, in my oppinion, unlikeable in some cases. I also had some complaints about how, where and, I guess going with the stories silly theme, when the story went. It would have been an alright story, but I feel it tried a bit to hard in many cases to do a story that has been done quite often.

Other than those complaints, these are my personal ones that point towards my earlier mention of only mildly similar stories sharing names when I feel they shouldn't. Bioshock was a series about Governmental extremes faults and mildly satirizing it, showing that every view is wrong when you make it the only view, and Infinite seemed like it was doing that at first but decided to go off the rails pretty hard near the end. Also on my personal complaint list, a bit part of Bioshock was Rapture, least to me. Columbia is a completely different place with a fairly different feel to it, so it annoys me they used an old cliched story in order to force it to be ok for them to change everything about Bioshock and claim it's still bioshock.

In closing, if you liked Bioshock for it's gameplay, you'll have loads of fun with this game, if you like story, you'll probably enjoy this game, but if you liked Rapture, Ryan and the Big Daddies, you'll probably want to look away, and if you dislike overly grand and expanded stories based around old cliched twists and the such in story telling, you'll probably want to avoid this as well.

Let me just start off saying that: Before Bioshock Infinite, I've never played a Bioshock game, much less watch anyone play it. I've heard about it and saw a few video clips here and there but other than that, the series never really striked my fancy because I never knew what kind of game the Bioshock series was. I found out about Infinite when a coworker told me how good it was from start to finish; he never spoiled anything for me, thankfully, so when I borrowed the game from a friend, I was coming in with no prior knowledge of anything Bioshock related.

Now let me follow that story with this statement: Bioshock Infinite is quite possibly the best game I've ever played. 
As I've said before, I've never played Bioshock 1 or 2 but even without that, Infinite still held it's own as a stand-alone game within the legendary trio. 
Infinite immerses the player in a story that they can't quite wrap their head around other than one simple objective "Bring us the girl, and wipe away the debt". As the player progresses, they unwravel truths about the world around them and about Columbia. 
Needless to say the game, throughout the entire playthrough, keeps the player on their toes with smooth combat, a well-written story, emotional music and immersive atmosphere; and I have to say that the atmosphere of this game is far beyond any of that which I've played before. 

Bioshock Infinite inspired me to play 1 and 2 after the fact which also sealed their stories deep within my heart and I will say that if you haven't played 1 or 2 either that you need to if you plan on getting the DLC for this game. 

Despite me having beaten the game at least 5 times and bought it twice; the game never gets old to me and suprisingly has rather decent replayability value. 
To me, Infinite is the perfect game with little to no flaws; it gets everything right and sets the bar for it. The only thing that disappointed me was the game leaving me wanting more.

That's why I give this game a solid 10/10.

I'm more of a casual gamer than anything, spending most of my time running a business, but Infinite has been a fantastic escape and I've thoroughly enjoyed playing it through about 6 times since I purchased it last year when it came out. 

Irrational Games has a deplorable gift of building up the player with their culturally/biologically sculpted expectations of heroism, positive emotionalism, and pseudo-intimacy between carefully crafted primary and secondary characters in a game, whether it be through their classic pre-recorded audio collectibles or in-game scene transitions, or, for Infinite, the 1 on 1 interfacing with Elizabeth, and then finalizing the psychological investment with an ending that baffles the mind and, at the same time, destroys all the intricate compilation of creative and emotional intimacy established between the established characters and the player. This leaves 90%-95% of their gameplay worth re-playing for the emotional and environmental experience, and the endings usually depressing and draining. Whether spawned from a narritive commentary on humanity or just the latest and greatest in shock endings, for me and others it's a good point to skip back to the beginning and re-experience the parts that breath vision and excitement into our busy lifes. 

Kevin Levine's gift for fantastically crafted story telling is unparalleled in this game, but his personal touch on gaming resolution errs more on the side of shock-value than bringing the masterpieces he creates to justified and re-visitable conclusions. From a psychological point of view one could link the hopelessness or pointlessness of many of the underlying themes running through both Bioshock 1, 2, and Infinite with the ideology that mankind is collectively and individually just an accident in an ongoing timeline that exists with or without us, and with 88-89% of the world not sharing this point of view it becomes more than clinically obvious why the game's potential hasn't reached as many people as it should have. Thankfully we all can embrass the universal human traits that he uses to negociate the audience through his wonderland.

But, whether the investment in storyline ideologies was an decision to subvert the marketing potential of the game, or the developers and producers were just trying to stand their ground on creative premise, the rest of the game is a fantastical interfacing with a real-world fantasy that creates as many questions as it attempts to answer in the realm of cross-dimensional quantum variations. 

Graphics, characters, music, and gameplay, there isn't another game like this one, and it's worth replaying the first 90% of it over and over again, and then spend the night arguing with your friends over all the plot holes in the last 10%. Definitely worth your time and money.

La historia os sumergirá inmediatamente en un mundo tan impresionante como Rapture, pero con mucha menos sensación de claustrofobia. Y sobre todo, cosa que me ha encantado y me ha motivado muchísimo ¡Ya no estrás sólo! No sólo por Elisabeth, si no por todo el elenco de PNJ's que hay distribuidos y que hacen de esta experiencia algo mucho más interesante.

Cuidados detalles en la trama argumental harán que te hagas una y otra vez preguntas. Y te harán disfrutar de una historia interesante y apasionante. Llegarás al final deseando que continue.

Sólo me queda decir: Este juego ha merecido muchísimo la pena.
Просто шедевр! Всем советую.

Sempre ouvi falar da Saga Bioshock e resolvi tentar! Foi meu primeiro Jogo no estilo FSP..
É Incrível, a história é o grande foco do jogo, e a jogabilidade vem para ajudar e deixá-la mais emocionante, além de ser bastante diferente dos FSP estilo Battlefield. Isso tudo com gráficos extraordinários e personagens muitos carismáticos e reais. Se você tiver oportunidade não deixe de jogar!

Dos 3 DLC, os mais interessantes são da saga "Burial at the Sea" (Enterro no Oceano) - O Primeiro episódio mostra um outra visão do primeiro Bioshock com jogabilidade do Infinite, e o Episódio 2, além de uma jogabilidade totalmente nova, mostra uma nova história do primeiro bioshock e alguns detalhes de assuntos em Bioshock Infinite. (Aconselho a todos que antes de jogar o episódio 2, termine o primeiro bioshock, isso vai lhe dar uma visão mais ampla sobre os acontecimentos). O DLC "Clash in the Cloud"(Confronto nas Nuvens) é mais no estilo "se desafie", com confrontos em área fechadas, também existe a possibilidade de ver a imagens e detalhes dos personagens e bastidores do desonvilmento do jogo.

Kesinlikle oynayın.

Une aventure épique se passant sur Columbia, une cité flottante au dessus des USA au début du 20ème siècle.
Votre mission est de retrouver sur cette cité une jeune femme, pour éponger des dettes.
Pour cela vous disposez d'armes et de pouvoirs divers. Le thème majeur du scénario étant les mondes parrallèles.
C'est un chef d'oeuvre. FPS linéaire à narration bien faite, histoire captivante. Graphiquement très réussi, avec une bande son qui l'est autant. Les DLC font le pont entre le jeu et le premier Bioshock.
Le scénario nous interpelle sur différents sujets toujours d'actualité.
Un indispensable à avoir dans sa bibliothèque de jeu. A acheter sans hésiter, je recommande.
Worth every penny! Great storyline and dlc's, this is by far my favorite game.

Čím jen začít? Je toho tolik, co o Bioshocku: Infinite říct.Tento povedený kousek co nese nazev uspěšné serie bioshock se už nebude odehrávat v městě Rapture ale v létajícím městě s názvem columbia které nechal založit blaznivý fanatik Comstock. budeme hrát za Bookera Dewitta zneucteného agenta bývalého soukromého detektiva Pinkertonovy knaceláře který dostal podivuhodný ukol přines nám dívku a tvůj dluh bude smazán. a tim začíná vaše dlouhá výprava odvezou vás k majáku, odpálí vas raketa do columbie, uchvátí vás krásné město navrhované Kenem levinem lažo plažo až do té doby než vás nazvou falešným pastýřem v tu chvíli po vás jde celá Columbie Comstock chce mít dívku pod zámkem Vox puli jaký si revolucionáří chtějí zabijt dívku a uprostřed toho vy se snažité dostat živou a zdravou dívku do new yorku. pruchodem hrou budete dostávat nové zbraně a jaké si nove schopnosti ktere nesou nazev Vigory Hlavní hrdina bude mít při svém boji o přežití spojence v podobě mladé dívenky Elizabeth. Ta disponuje jakousi vyšší mocí a bude schopna hráči pomoci ve složitých situacích.Jako třeba vyvolání trhliny z které se zjeví mechanická podpora nebo také lékarníčky a zbraně. může vám sem tam hodit nějaké peníze náboje a nebo vás upozornit že jste něco přehlédli. Když umřete tak to bude ona kdo vám píchne iněkci čehosi co vás vrátí k životu. Osobně jsem si myslel že Elizabeth se mi bude plest pod nohy a bude mě vytáčet jako ve většině her kdy vám někdo pomáha Doslova jsem se mylíl hra je na špičkové urovni Hrátelnost je perfektní Grafika to je něco mimořádného už jen z prvních chvil máte chut se podívát z okna jestli tam u vás někde není na obloze nějaké město tak to vas doslova připouta k židli hned vám to navnadí tu atmosferu plus ten příběh který je tak nabušený a po dohráni zůstanete s otevřenou pusou a budete chtít víc. průměrná doba hrání je něco okolo 12 hodin a to za ty peníze stojí

Superbe jeu, très intéressant, histoire complexe et bien ficeler, le monde est extra et super developper. J'ai adorer le setting 1912 avec la musique, mêler à la biochimie qui permettent des augmentations.

Je recommende fortement, et mainetant, je vais aller me chercher les expensions
